name: Imanol Herrero
title: FullStack Web Developer & IT Technician
about_me_description: Proven experience as a Web Developer, currently seeking new opportunities to expand my knowledge and contribute my teamwork, proactivity, and commitment.
description_frontend: I developed the entire Front End of the project following a design proposed in Figma, where I carried out tasks such as integrating various APIs from the Back End, 100% responsive design, persistence, conditional rendering, and dynamic routes.
description_fullstack: I was responsible for tasks both in the Front End following the design proposed in Figma and in the Back End developing a CRUD (create, read, update, delete).
